pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)14$(br)$(#bd951a)Damage:$()$(#ff0000)16$(br)$(#bd951a)Range:$()$(#ff0000)6$(br)$(#bd951a)Fire Rate:$()$(#ff0000)1s$(br)$(#bd951a)Special:$()$(#ff0000)Poisons zombies for 3 seconds. Damages multiple zombies at the same time. Asleep if exposed to light.$(br)$(#bd951a)"I was in a dead-end job producing yeast spores for a bakery. "Then I heard about this great opportunity blasting zombies. Now I really feel like I'm making a difference."

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)Fume-shrooms shoot fumes that can pass through zombies.
